member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Services.TestManagement.TestPlanning.WebApi.Outcome.Unspecified
member.summary: Only used during an update to preserve the existing value.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Services.TestManagement.TestPlanning.WebApi.Outcome.None
member.summary: Test has not been completed, or the test type does not report pass/failure.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Services.TestManagement.TestPlanning.WebApi.Outcome.Passed
member.summary: Test was executed w/o any issues.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Services.TestManagement.TestPlanning.WebApi.Outcome.Failed
member.summary: Test was executed, but there were issues. Issues may involve exceptions or failed assertions.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Services.TestManagement.TestPlanning.WebApi.Outcome.Inconclusive
member.summary: Test has completed, but we can't say if it passed or failed. May be used for aborted tests...

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Services.TestManagement.TestPlanning.WebApi.Outcome.Timeout
member.summary: The test timed out

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Services.TestManagement.TestPlanning.WebApi.Outcome.Aborted
member.summary: Test was aborted. This was not caused by a user gesture, but rather by a framework decision.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Services.TestManagement.TestPlanning.WebApi.Outcome.Blocked
member.summary: Test had it chance for been executed but was not, as ITestElement.IsRunnable == false.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Services.TestManagement.TestPlanning.WebApi.Outcome.NotExecuted
member.summary: Test was not executed. This was caused by a user gesture - e.g. user hit stop button.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Services.TestManagement.TestPlanning.WebApi.Outcome.Warning
member.summary: To be used by Run level results. This is not a failure.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Services.TestManagement.TestPlanning.WebApi.Outcome.Error
member.summary: There was a system error while we were trying to execute a test.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Services.TestManagement.TestPlanning.WebApi.Outcome.NotApplicable
member.summary: Test is Not Applicable for execution.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Services.TestManagement.TestPlanning.WebApi.Outcome.Paused
member.summary: Test is paused.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Services.TestManagement.TestPlanning.WebApi.Outcome.InProgress
member.summary: Test is currently executing. Added this for TCM charts

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Services.TestManagement.TestPlanning.WebApi.Outcome.NotImpacted
member.summary: Test is not impacted. Added fot TIA.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Services.TestManagement.TestPlanning.WebApi.PointState.None
member.summary: Default

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Services.TestManagement.TestPlanning.WebApi.PointState.Ready
member.summary: The test point needs to be executed in order for the test pass to be considered complete. Either the test has not been run before or the previous run failed.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Services.TestManagement.TestPlanning.WebApi.PointState.Completed
member.summary: The test has passed successfully and does not need to be re-run for the test pass to be considered complete.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Services.TestManagement.TestPlanning.WebApi.PointState.NotReady
member.summary: The test point needs to be executed but is not able to.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Services.TestManagement.TestPlanning.WebApi.PointState.InProgress
member.summary: The test is being executed.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Services.TestManagement.TestPlanning.WebApi.ResultState.Unspecified
member.summary: Only used during an update to preserve the existing value.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Services.TestManagement.TestPlanning.WebApi.ResultState.Pending
member.summary: Test is in the execution queue, was not started yet.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Services.TestManagement.TestPlanning.WebApi.ResultState.Queued
member.summary: Test has been queued. This is applicable when a test case is queued for execution

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Services.TestManagement.TestPlanning.WebApi.ResultState.InProgress
member.summary: Test is currently executing.

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Services.TestManagement.TestPlanning.WebApi.ResultState.Paused
member.summary: Test has been paused. This is applicable when a test case is paused by the user (For e.g. Manual Tester can pause the execution of the manual test case)

member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Services.TestManagement.TestPlanning.WebApi.ResultState.Completed
member.summary: Test has completed, but there is no quantitative measure of completeness. This may apply to load tests.
